trans-unit.source: Create features for Azure blob storage data using Panda | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create features for Azure blob storage data using Panda | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to create features for data that is stored in Azure blob container with the Panda Python package.
trans-unit.target: How to create features for data that is stored in Azure blob container with the Panda Python package.

trans-unit.source: Create features for Azure blob storage data using Panda
trans-unit.target: Create features for Azure blob storage data using Panda

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introduction

trans-unit.source: This document covers how to create features for data that is stored in Azure blob container using [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org/) Python package.
trans-unit.target: This document covers how to create features for data that is stored in Azure blob container using [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org/) Python package.

trans-unit.source: After outlining how to load into a Panda data frame, it shows how to generate categorical features with indicator values and binning features, both using Python scripts.
trans-unit.target: After outlining how to load into a Panda data frame, it shows how to generate categorical features with indicator values and binning features, both using Python scripts.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.INCLUDE [cap-create-features-data-selector](../../includes/cap-create-features-selector.md)] This **menu** links to topics that describe how to create features for data in various environments.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.INCLUDE [cap-create-features-data-selector](../../includes/cap-create-features-selector.md)] This **menu** links to topics that describe how to create features for data in various environments.

trans-unit.source: This task is a step in the [Cortana Analytics Process (CAP)](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/learning-paths/cortana-analytics-process/).
trans-unit.target: This task is a step in the [Cortana Analytics Process (CAP)](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/learning-paths/cortana-analytics-process/).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: This article assumes that you have:
trans-unit.target: This article assumes that you have:

trans-unit.source: Created an Azure blob storage account and have stored your data there.
trans-unit.target: Created an Azure blob storage account and have stored your data there.

trans-unit.source: If you need instructions to set up an account, see [Create an Azure Storage account](../hdinsight-get-started.md#storage)
trans-unit.target: If you need instructions to set up an account, see [Create an Azure Storage account](../hdinsight-get-started.md#storage)

trans-unit.source: Load the data into a Pandas data frame
trans-unit.target: Load the data into a Pandas data frame

trans-unit.source: In order to do explore and manipulate a dataset, it must be downloaded from the blob source to a local file which can then be loaded in a Pandas data frame.
trans-unit.target: In order to do explore and manipulate a dataset, it must be downloaded from the blob source to a local file which can then be loaded in a Pandas data frame.

trans-unit.source: Here are the steps to follow for this procedure:
trans-unit.target: Here are the steps to follow for this procedure:

trans-unit.source: Download the data from Azure blob with the following sample Python code using blob service.
trans-unit.target: Download the data from Azure blob with the following sample Python code using blob service.

trans-unit.source: Replace the variable in the code below with your specific values:
trans-unit.target: Replace the variable in the code below with your specific values:

trans-unit.source: Read the data into a Pandas data-frame from the downloaded file.
trans-unit.target: Read the data into a Pandas data-frame from the downloaded file.

trans-unit.source: Now you are ready to explore the data and generate features on this dataset.
trans-unit.target: Now you are ready to explore the data and generate features on this dataset.

trans-unit.target: Feature Generation

trans-unit.source: The next two sections show how to generate categorical features with indicator values and binning features using Python scripts.
trans-unit.target: The next two sections show how to generate categorical features with indicator values and binning features using Python scripts.

trans-unit.source: Writing data back to Azure blob and consuming in Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Writing data back to Azure blob and consuming in Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: After you have explored the data and created the necessary features, you can upload the data (sampled or featurized) to an Azure blob and consume it in Azure Machine Learning using the following steps:
trans-unit.target: After you have explored the data and created the necessary features, you can upload the data (sampled or featurized) to an Azure blob and consume it in Azure Machine Learning using the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Note that additional features can be created in the Azure Machine Learning Studio as well.
trans-unit.target: Note that additional features can be created in the Azure Machine Learning Studio as well.
